message_1: What is the complete combustion equation and balanced chemical equation for the reaction between methane (CH4) and oxygen (O2)?
message_2:
The complete combustion of methane (CH4) in the presence of oxygen (O2) produces carbon dioxide (CO2) and water (H2O). The balanced chemical equation for this reaction is:

CH4 + 2O2 â†’ CO2 + 2H2O
